title: Create CAR MODEL-is-successor-of Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›is-successor-of‹ is created when the provided IDs of both CAR MODELS are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›is-successor-of‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* At the same time a CAR MODEL can only be in a ›is-successor-of‹ relationship with one CAR MODEL
* A CAR MODEL cannot be connected to itself
